official_title: Optimizing Surgical Decisions in Young Adults With Breast Cancer
inclusion_criteria:
* Female aged 18-44
* New diagnosis of Stage 0, 1, 2, or 3 unilateral breast cancer
* English or Spanish speaking
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must be FEMALE
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
Must have maximum age of 44 Years
exclusion_criteria:
* Diagnosis of de novo Stage 4 breast cancer
* Recurrent early-stage breast cancer
* Bilateral breast cancer
